Increíble juego, merece la pena completamente, historia muy interesante que continúa con un modo co-op muy bien hecho.

Jugué del tirón Portal 1 y 2 y se nota que en esta entrega han refinado todos los aspectos que podían incomodar de la anterior, mapas más dinámicos y vivos, historia más pulida con varios personajes que aparecen recurrentemente... una joya

Deseando que Valve aprenda a contar hasta 3 

10/10

🌀 Portal 2 - госпади, эта игра мне очень понравилась, хотя я думал, что она будет такой же как и первая часть. Очень многое изменилось, начиная с заставок и заканчивая разнообразным гемплеем. ) Эта игра меня очень парадовала своей атмосферой и меняющимся сюжетом, 🔺 безусловно эта игра теперь войдёт в список моих любимых игр 🔺 ! 💙💚💛💜

+Плюсы этой игры :
   1. Радует, что разработчики изменили главное меню и все заставки ! 💙
   2. Ооо мой бог, они добавили сюда саундтреки и лёгкую мелодию ( как же ёё не хвотало в первой части Portal ! ) 💚
   3. Крутые сюжетные повороты и главное развязка ! 💛
   4. Просто крутейший _САУНД-ТРЕК_ в конце игры ! 💜
   5. Интересно было следить за сюжетом :D 
   6. _ГЛАДЕС_ ТОП ! 💙💚💛💜
   7. Игра Огромная, я не ожидал даже , она очень очень большая ! ⏰
   8. Спасибо, что мне вернули моего друга в конце игры ! 💠( Куб компаньён )💠
   9. Добавили коператив, в нём очень крутые уровни, их намного интереснее проходить + ещё с другом или онлайн 🙂👍

После середины игры ( Где то между серединой и концом ) мне не понравились эти уровни, мне кажется они были лишними (Они меня реально изматывали ) не то что бы, они были сложными, нет просто немного надоедают, ( мне кажется, они просто сделаны чтобы увеличить время гейм-плея :D
_Мне всё понравилось в этой игре ! _
( Некоторые Уровни стали сложнее, они занимают определённое количесво времени, на их прохождение )
Покупайте эту игру ! Я рекомендую, не надо стесняться  !
Теперь это будет моей любимой игрой ! 😍

Мой вердикт_>>>>>>>>>>>  10 лун из 10,______  10🌚/10🌚

                                            11 оленей из 10,____  11🐂/ 10 🦄🐮🐎🐴
                                          
                                            1 птица из 1,_______ 1🦅(🐔) / 1🦅(🐔)

                                            1 крутая музыка из 1,__1🎵/ 1🎵

                  и                        1 куб компаньён из -10 , 10💠/ 10 💠 Топ игра!! Очень понравилась :D

The portal 🌀 2 - Jesus, this game I really liked, although I thought that it will be the same as the first part. A lot has changed since the ending cutscenes and various gameplay. ) In this game, I remember the atmosphere and changing the plot, 🔺 of course this game is now included into the list of my favorite games 🔺 ! 💙💚💜💛

The pros of this game :
  1. I am glad that the developers changed the main menu and all the screen savers ! 💙
  2. Ohh my God, they've added soundtracks and easy melody ( how could it not. in the first part of the portal ! ) 💚
  3. Cool plot twists and the outcome is important ! 💛
  4. Just SOUND-TREK coolest at the end of the game ! 💜
  5. It was interesting to follow the story :d 
  6. _GLADES TOP_ ! 💙💚💜💛
  7. The game is Huge, I don't even expect , she is very very big ! get creative with baby airlines
  8. Thank you, I've got my friend at the end of the game ! 💠( Companion cube )💠
  9. Added to play together , it is very cool levels, they are much more fun to pass, even with a friend or online 🙂👍

After the mid-game ( somewhere between middle and end ) I did not like these levels, I think they were unnecessary (They make me really exhausted ), not that they were complicated, there is just a little tired, ( I think they are just done to increase the game play :d
_I liked everything in this game ! _
( Some Levels are difficult, they take a certain amount of time, on their passage )
Buy this game ! I recommend, don't be shy !
It's Now my favorite game ! 😍

Bir kaç bölüm sonra IQ'm yetmedi bıraktım. Siz oynayabilirsiniz.

Single player:
This storyline is awesome. I wont spoil it though. The shifts in power are interesting, the puzzles are challenging enough to enterain but not so hard that you'll never figure it out. The controls (xbox 360 controller) could be a little more fine-tuned but its not bad. 

Community test chambers:
Somehow my xbox 360 controller isnt usable in most of the menus here. If you manage to struggle through them with the assistance of mouse and keyboard, You'll have access to a huge amount of extra gaming time. Being community-made, these levels have a variety of difficulty and they use some elements that are not in the single player game. 

Sounds & songs:
The sound effects in the levels are very nice. They create a wonderful atmosphere. This is heavily contrasted by long, soundless, loading screens. I have discovered only one song in the game yet, "want you gone" in the end credits. I freaking love this song. Please, if you beat the game, take the time to listen to the music, the song and the speech at the end.

Portal 2 is easily one of my all-time favorite games.

Her neyse ne diyodum oyun çok güzel kesinlikle oynanmalı onlinenı ayrı zevkli kesinlikle tavsiyem...

传送门是我玩的第一款解谜类游戏，第一次就给了我对这类游戏不错的影响印象，甚至有点感觉6块钱买来是不是太不人道了=~=

세상에서 가장 어려운 퍼즐은? 친구와 포탈2 코옵엔딩 보기. (무슨 뜻인지 아시겠죠? 하하)

플레이 시간 : 약 7시간

가성비 : 높음

몰입도 : 높음

난이도 : 보통

현재 같이 할 친구가 없어서 싱글 엔딩만 보았습니다. 아무래도 제 지갑을 털어서라도 포탈2를 쥐어주고 강제로 시켜야하나 봐요. 게임은 전작에 비해서 훨씬 퀄리티가 높아졌습니다. 포탈 1은 퍼즐 위주로 진행되다가 스토리가 향신료처럼 살짝 가미된 느낌이라면 포탈 2는 시작부터 스토리를 베이스로 퍼즐과 조화를 잘 이룬 작품입니다. 기본적으로 포탈건을 사용한다는 것은 포탈 시리즈가 모두 같으나 포탈2에서는 퍼즐 요소들이 더 추가되었고 정형화된 실험실에서 벗어나 샛길이나 바깥에 있는 시간이 아주 길어져서 저처럼 일탈을 좋아하는 못된 사람에게는 더욱 재미를 주었습니다. 

꽤 쉬운 포탈 1의 퍼즐에 비해서 포탈 2의 퍼즐은 대체적으로 난이도가 상승하였지만 곰곰히 생각하면 아주 못풀 정도는 아닙니다. 또한 센스도 아주 폭발합니다. (배틀 블럭 시어터를 따라오지는 못하겠지만요) 챕터마다 게임 시작화면이 바뀌기도 합니다. 

참고로 엔딩 때 나오는 터렛 오페라는 꼭 유튜브에서 한글자막있는 영상으로도 보세요. 자막을 게임 내에서 달아줬으면 더 좋았을텐데 말이죠. 그 외에도 여러 포탈2의 영상들이 유튜브에 있습니다. 

Tip. 로봇의 마음은 갈대랍니다.

Fantastik bulmacalarıyla karşımıza çıkan bu oyun kesinlikle bulmaca sevenlerin sevdiği türden bir oyun. Hem hikayesinden hem de bulmacalarından dolayı çok seviliyor. Üstüne üstlük de arkadaşlarınız (Bilim Partnerleriniz) ile bir çok deneyi geçebilir ve insanlığı kurtarabilirsiniz !!! Oyunu hikaye bazlı oyun severlere tavsiye ediyorum.

Проходили вместе c друзьями в мультиплеере, было весело, особенно орали над второй концовкой :D. В одиночном режиме на 7 главе было сложно, я вообще не мог понять, куда стрелять, но после внимательного осмотра карты всё-таки дошло).
Минусы: во время мультиплеера может зависнуть, иногда вылетает и иногда становится невозможно пользоваться микрофоном у обоих игроков (баг какой-то, из-за него перезапускать игру приходится).
P.S. Классная игра для любителей головоломок, прошел без прохождений, советую :)

It must have been a dautning task to try to follow up the amazing Portal.  To its credit Portal 2 is a wonderful expansion to  the concepts introduced in the original and the characters in the game are all memorable.  Its not better than the original, but its is funnier longer and has a better ending.  Overall a fantastic game with a great sense of humor.

9.0/10

I bought both of these on sale during the summer sale. I played through Portal and thoroughly enjoyed it. But Portal 2 is even better than the original. If you have not played the original Portal go play it so you can understand the whole story. In this game you will become attached to the characters especially the turrets that I love so much which is why I hate killing them. If you get stuck there are plenty of resources and guides to help you. Overall it is an excellent game one of the best I have ever played. I hope they make a movie about it eventually.

两部游戏都有少许烧脑。。但剧情却很不错。。很有趣。。
主要就是讲女主与终端的爱恨情仇的故事。。。
最后的最后！看到的那片黄金色的田野。。。还有两首BGM。。真让人感觉到了一种很不错的成就感。。

两作都通关了，过来写一下感受。相较于前作，这一作的难度我感觉的话大有提高，后期大脑几乎处于烧焦状态。但仍然是非常出色的作品。出现了很多新角色（个人感觉没一个讨喜的。很多新型关卡（大脑烧焦。剧情的话还是那样：女主真顽强。
[spoiler] GlaDOS对卡若琳绝对是真爱啊，最后听歌居然听泪目了[/spoiler]

Wonderful game full stupid jokes you can't help but laugh at, LOADS of unique puzzles, and a very interesting story. One playthrough is good for about 5-6 hours of playtime, but you won't be able to help going back and finding all the little details, and the different ways to comeplete the puzzles.

I'm just genuiely confused. The game is repetitive. No question about that, it's a bunch of puzzles, I don't mind different games, I don't mind games that are not tailored around in your face action, but Portal 2 is just a glorified Sudoku. So if that's your thing, get this game. I guess. To me, it's overrated.
